parameters.text: =👋 Hi! Your calendar is clear for today 🗓️✨

parameters.content:
## 1.Workflow trigger and Google Calendar

The workflow is **triggered automatically** each morning at 7am.

Then the second node will **analyse your Google Calendar** of the day looking for any event or meeting scheduled.

How to setup:
Set up your Google Agenda **API credentials**

calendar.cachedResultName: Jours fériés et autres fêtes en France

parameters.content:
## 2.Count event code and Branch

The first node will **count the number of event items** scheduled and **return a number**. Even if there is no event, a number (0 in this case) would be returned.

The the second node will **analyse this number**, if the number is not 0, the True branch ✅ will be activated. If it's O, it will be the False branch ❌ that will be activated.

## 3. Send the telegram message

In the **True branch** ✅, the code node, will create the message and gather all the informations wanted about the events and meeting. So a full sum um will be sent in one message only.
In the Telegram send text node, the **message is sent**.

If it's the **False branch** ❌, the Telegram node will send the **message about not having meeting that day**.

How to setup:
- Set up a Telegram bot and get the key API.
- Connect the API credentials to the node.
- For the **True branch** ✅, set up your message in javascript and then copy and paste the json file in the next node.
- For the **False branch** ❌, just set up your message.

## Required

- Telegram Bot and its API
- Google account
- Google Calendar API

_metadata.name: Daily Calendar Summary Notifications via Telegram from Google Calendar
